header.rec_loc: In a small town, ANON, ANON and ANON’s house.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Jobs, friends and events, call centres, clothing and appearances, countries, volunteering and holidays, football, places of birth, food, lifestyle and day-to-day activities, stories, alcohol
header.activity: Family and partner talking to a hairdresser in a house, talking about future events, day-to-day activities, discussing current events and debates.
